channel.description: Recent content in blog on savar

item.title: Lifting for Beginners
item.description:
A lot of my friends keep asking me the same basic questions again and again, hence this article.
Here’s my updated workout split, if you’re here for just that.

Introduction

The goal of this article is to impart basic knowledge and a roadmap for beginners who wish to get bigger and stronger but don’t know where to start.

1.1 Terminology for Dummies
1.2 Terminology
1.3 Why Workout?
1.4 Quickstart

item.title: Workout
item.description:
I follow a push, pull, leg inspired split.
If you’re here to learn as a beginner, I’d redirect you to here.

Push (chest, biceps, front and side delts)

  • Seated DB Overhead Press ss Preacher Curl
  • Incline DB Press ss Preacher Curl
  • Lateral Raises SS Hammer curls
  • Hanging Knee Raises

No overhead pressing for now.

Pull (back, triceps, rear delt)

  • Neutral Grip Cable High Row / Conventional Deadlifts (alternate)
  • Neutral Grip Pulldown SS Skull Crushers
  • DB Rows
  • V-Bar Tricep Pushdown SS Reverse Pec Deck

Legs (quads, hamstrings)

  • Squats
  • Leg Curls
  • Obliques

No direct calf work, rather I try to get in ~10k steps everyday, which is the only cardio I do in a day.

item.title: Fix your attention span
item.description:
A summary to this video by @aevytv.

Why to fix attention?

The ability to focus, be creative, and being bored are innate to human beings and probably the very reasons they are powerful. If we lose our ability to channel our attention, we risk losing all these qualities that make us interesting and useful, and that’s no bueno.
It makes doing simple low dopamine tasks like reading books, going through an assignment, even working out a great challenge to push through.
Personally, I would like myself better if I’m more productive and consuming media consciously.

item.title: Movies & Shows
item.description:
I’d recommend everyone to watch these at least once in their lifetimes.

42 (2013)

added on 07 Feb, 2025

The story of the baseball legend Jackie Robinson’s journey starting out in the MLB, highlighting the racism in the sport. All the leads have done phenomenal acting, and this is a movie you won’t forget anytime soon.
Fun Fact - This is the movie that earned Chadwick Boseman his role as Black Panther, and rightfully so. May he rest in peace.

item.title: Why Deepseek is better than ChatGPT
item.description:
Why DeepSeek Is Better Than ChatGPT: A Comprehensive Analysis

In the rapidly evolving world of artificial intelligence, language models like ChatGPT have made significant strides in natural language processing, enabling machines to generate human-like text and engage in meaningful conversations. However, as a more advanced iteration of AI, DeepSeek brings several key advantages that set it apart from ChatGPT. Hereâ€™s why DeepSeek is better:

1. Enhanced Contextual Understanding

While ChatGPT is impressive in its ability to generate coherent responses, DeepSeek is designed with a deeper understanding of context. It can maintain longer and more complex conversations without losing track of the topic. This allows DeepSeek to provide more accurate and relevant responses, especially in nuanced or multi-layered discussions.
